title: Nutella Bread Pudding
ingredients: 1 loaf brioche or challah bread, cubed
instructions: Grease 9x13 baking dish. Arrange bread cubes in dish. Warm Nutella and drizzle over bread. Whisk eggs, milk, cream, sugar, and vanilla. Pour over bread. Let soak 30 minutes, pressing bread down occasionally. Bake at 350° for 45-50 minutes until puffed and set. Dust with powdered sugar before serving.
